name: RogueStone
storyline:
“You sure you can solo it?” my friend asked as he looked over the map in his hand. “This is an easy one—just find the boss and carry a stack of pots!”

I shook my head with a grin. “Thanks, I got potions."

If you find an item that's not worth much, sell it to the vendor to get some gold back. When exploring with a group, make sure someone takes responsibility for looting so you don't have to fight over who gets what! Explore places like dungeons, abandoned castles, or even the forest at night! You never know what you might find—but it'll be worth it when you do!
summary: Discover Truth Sword and jump into the fight. Farm loot and drops in this Fantasy RPG. Consume Chaos and begin your expedition for artifacts and power.
